sentences.en: An extraneous element is being introduced into the case.
sentences.cn: 你们把与本案无关的话题扯进来了.

sentences.en: Because of the extraneous and uncontrolled factors, those may affect the dependent variable.
sentences.cn: 由于许多外来的无法控制的因素, 这些因素可能影响应变因素.

sentences.en: His account of the fire accident includes a lot of extraneous details.
sentences.cn: 他对失火事件的描述含有大量离题的细节.

sentences.en: His account of the war includes a lot of extraneous details.
sentences.cn: 他对战争的叙述含有大量离题的细节.

sentences.en: I can choose to ignore these extraneous thoughts or certainly choose not to act on them.
sentences.cn: 我可以选择无视这些无关的想法，当然也可以选择不按这些想法行事。

sentences.en: I can choose to ignore these extraneous thoughts.
sentences.cn: 我可以选择无视这些无关的想法。

sentences.en: Our price were calculated without insurance against any extraneous risks.
sentences.cn: 我们未把任何附加险计算在报价内.

sentences.en: Period! No other extraneous or random factors can enter into the equation.
sentences.cn: 这个 过程 中不能有外部的事件或随机的因素中断.

sentences.en: Please confine yourself to the topic; don't include extraneous material.
sentences.cn: 请就题发挥, 不要说与本题无关的话.

sentences.en: Reductant from an extraneous source is introduced.
sentences.cn: 外来的还原剂被引进来.

sentences.en: Several extraneous prefaces were cut out of the prayer book at the beginning of the eleventh century.
sentences.cn: 11世纪初，几篇无关紧要的序言被从这本祈祷书中删去了。

sentences.en: The aforesaid total absence of conversation allowed every extraneous sound to be heard.
sentences.cn: 上边谈到的他们的默不作声使得四方传来的一声一音都可以听得见.

sentences.en: The rapid urbanization produces a lot of extraneous people.
sentences.cn: 城市化的加速催生了庞大的外来人口群体.

sentences.en: To screen out extraneous thoughts, he closed his eyes and drew a deep breath.
sentences.cn: 为了摒弃种种杂念, 他闭上眼睛,深吸了一口气.

sentences.en: We ought not to bring in extraneous matters in trying to find a basis for a settlement.
sentences.cn: 我们努力寻求解决问题的基础时，不应该牵扯进无关的事情。

trans.tran_cn: 外部的，外来的，无关的，不相干的
